title: 大家快教一下我
author: huangyimin
txt_content: 服务器里面普通玩家点木牌传送说无权限，下的是http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 3173&highlight=随机传送这个插件怎么给普通玩家权限

replies.author: zhiji
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhiji 于 2014-9-1 21:31 编辑 

你用OP 号输入/mangaddp default RandomLocation.Use

金粒拿来

replies.author: huangyimin
replies.txt_content: 用小号点，她说：You don't ot permissiion to do that hera
